summary: Frontend testing completed for mental health assessment website. Critical navigation bug fix verified - PHQ-9 and MBTI assessments now correctly navigate to their respective results pages instead of redirecting to homepage.

issues: Copyright year shows 2024 instead of 2025/current year - minor cosmetic issue

critical_code_review_comments: ResultsMBTI.js: No data-testid attributes on MBTI results buttons (Back to Home, Retake Test) - could add for consistency
Assessment cards have proper data-testid attributes (data-testid='assessment-card-{id}')
context_for_next_testing_agent: All critical flows tested and verified: PHQ-9 (9 questions), MBTI (16 questions), results page navigation, Instagram follow gate, and Back to Home navigation. The hasProcessedState useRef fix is working correctly to prevent redirect loops.

home_page.details: Home page loads with assessment cards (PHQ-9, GAD-7, MBTI, etc.)

phq9_assessment_flow.details: All 9 questions completed successfully. Options selectable, Next/Previous buttons work, Submit button appears on last question

phq9_results_navigation.details: CRITICAL BUG FIX VERIFIED - Successfully navigates to /results/phq9 after submission instead of redirecting to home

phq9_results_display.details: Results page shows score (0 - Minimal), Instagram follow gate visible

phq9_follow_gate.details: 'I've Followed - Show Full Results' button reveals detailed analysis with What This Means, Understanding Your Results, Recommended Next Steps sections

mbti_assessment_flow.details: All 16 questions completed successfully with proper navigation

mbti_results_navigation.details: CRITICAL BUG FIX VERIFIED - Successfully navigates to /results-mbti/mbti after submission

mbti_results_display.details: Results page shows personality type (ESTJ - The Executive), Instagram follow gate visible

back_to_home_navigation.details: Back to Home button works from both PHQ-9 and MBTI results pages
